General.Name: SES AI Corp
General.Description: SES AI Corporation engages in the development and production of high-performance Lithium-metal rechargeable batteries for electric vehicles, electric vehicle take-off and landing, and other applications. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts.
General.Address: 35 Cabot Road, Woburn, MA, United States, 01801
